name: Submarine (itch) (Sima Games)
description:
Gameplay

Dive into the thrilling world of underwater adventure "Submarine"! In this flappy bird-style game, you take on the role of a daring submarine pilot, using gravity to navigate through the treacherous depths of the ocean while avoiding dangerous mines.

Story

In a far-off corner of the ocean, an intrepid submarine pilot sets out on a daring mission to explore the depths of the sea. Armed with only his trusty vessel and quick reflexes, he plunges into the darkness, eager to uncover the secrets hidden beneath the waves.

As he dives deeper and deeper, the pilot encounters all manner of obstacles, from treacherous mines to jagged rocks and deadly sea creatures. But with a little ingenuity and a lot of determination, he manages to overcome them all, using his wits and his gravity-defying skills to stay one step ahead of danger.

Along the way, the pilot discovers a rich and vibrant world teeming with life, from colorful coral reefs to ancient shipwrecks and mysterious underwater caves. And as he explores these hidden wonders, he begins to realize that there is more to this underwater world than he ever could have imagined.

Will you join the pilot on his daring mission to uncover the secrets of the deep? With "Submarine", the adventure is yours to discover!

Controls

Just press any key you can find.
